text: Andravida–Kyllini () is a municipality in the Elis regional unit, West Greece region, Greece. The seat of the municipality is the town Lechaina.Kallikratis law Greece Ministry of Interior The municipality has an area of 355.476 km2. ==Municipality== The municipality Andravida–Kyllini was formed at the 2011 local government reform by the merger of the following 4 former municipalities, that became municipal units: *Andravida *Kastro-Kyllini *Lechaina *Vouprasia ==References== Category:Municipalities of Western Greece Category:Populated places in Elis
title: Andravida-Kyllini
